properties.site-address: Former Cedar House School, Kirkby Lonsdale
properties.notes: Hybrid application for full planning permission for conversion of former school dining hall to six dwellings and part of the former main school building to two dwellings and outline planning permission for demolition of remaining former school buildings and erection of up to 12 residential dwellings with vehicular access. Two applications were subsequently submitted in 2017 but later withdrawn: SL/2017/0421 - reserved matters application for the erection of 12 dwellings and SL/2017/1067 – demolition of existing building and erection of 6 affordable dwellings. An amended scheme for part of the site (SL/2018/0608 for 3 detached houses) was approved in December 2018 which replaced the previous proposal for 12 dwellings, thus reducing the overall estimated capacity from 20 dwellings to 11 dwellings. Site is under construction.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: Former Cedar House School, Kirkby Lonsdale
properties.notes: Original hybrid application for full planning permission for conversion of former school dining hall to six dwellings and part of the former main school building to two dwellings and outline planning permission for demolition of remaining former school buildings and erection of up to 12 residential dwellings with vehicular access.An amended scheme for part of the site (SL/2018/0608 for 3 detached houses) was approved in December 2018 which replaced the previous proposal for 12 dwellings, and this part is under construction. Then SL/2019/0823 granted Feb 2020 for construction of 3 dwellings in SW corner superseding previous plans for 6 units in that part of site. Cressbrook House now converted to one luxury home. Total site capacity now 9, with 3 completed (Cressbrook houes, and conversion of part of former building to 2 units under original application. Remaining 6 units are the three luxury homes under construction in NE corner, and new permission for 3 units in SW corner.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
